## OverlayFlyoutOpenOptions.onClose property

EuiFlyout onClose handler. If provided the consumer is responsible for calling flyout.close() to close the flyout;

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
onClose?: (flyout: OverlayRef) => void;
```
